title: Information, education, and health behaviors: Evidence from
author: Lenisa V Chang
description: In the wake of strong, although later refuted, claims of a link between autism and the measlesmumpsrubella (MMR) vaccine, I examine whether fewer parents immunized or delayed vaccinations for their
